programme.title: Shankly: Football's Greatest
programme.desc: A look back at Bill Shankly's phenomenal achievements in his 15 years at Liverpool. The Scot took the Reds from the second division to the top of English football..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Gold:R.Madrid v Valencia
programme.desc: A chance to relive Valencia's trip to Real Madrid in January 2003. A Madrid side brimming with world class talent tore through their opponents in a five-goal thriller..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Gold:Barcelona v Valencia
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic Spanish football matches. Here is Valencia against Barcelona in the second leg of their Copa del Rey quarter-final from the 1998/99 season..(n)

programme.title: Capello:Football's Greatest
programme.desc: Ex-England manager Fabio Capello has enjoyed a fine managerial career in Europe. The Italian has won seven league titles in Italy and Spain, as well as capturing the UEFA Champions League..(n)

programme.title: Trapattoni:Football's Greatest
programme.desc: Few can match Giovanni Trapattoni. In a career spanning 25 years, he has won league titles in Italy, Germany, Portugal and Austria, as well as a European Cup and three Europa League titles..(n)

programme.title: Celtic: Football's Greatest
programme.desc: A profile of the Celtic side that lifted the European Cup in 1967. Features rare archive footage and exclusive interviews with the likes of Billy McNeill and Bertie Auld..(n)

programme.title: Benfica: Football's Greatest
programme.desc: A look at the incredible success achieved by Benfica during the 1960s. Features rare archive footage and exclusive interviews with the likes of Eusebio and Antonio Simoes..(n)

programme.title: Di Stefano:Football's Greatest
programme.desc: A profile of the late Alfredo Di Stefano. The attacking midfielder is most associated with his time at Real Madrid, where he won eight league titles and five European Cups..(n)

programme.title: Van Basten: Football's Greatest
programme.desc: A profile of Dutch master Marco Van Basten. Most famous for his breathtaking goal for Holland in the 1988 European Championships, he also starred for Ajax and AC Milan..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Football Gold
programme.desc: Relive a classic encounter between Barcelona and Osasuna at the Nou Camp in 2011..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Gold:Atletico v Barcelona
programme.desc: Relive the classic encounter between Atletico Madrid and Barcelona at the Vicente Calderon in 2007..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Gold-El Clasico 2010/11
programme.desc: Barcelona take on Real Madrid at the Nou Camp in this classic La Liga clash from the 2010/11 campaign. Barca were looking for their fifth straight win over their great rivals..(n)

programme.title: Spanish Gold-El Clasico-2005/06
programme.desc: Real Madrid face Barcelona at the Santiago Bernabeu in this classic La Liga clash from the 2005/06 campaign. Madrid had already lost twice at home coming into this match..(n)
